context.rdfs:comment: A single message from a sender to one or more organizations or people.
context.rdfs:label: Message

properties.rdfs:comment: The date/time at which the message has been read by the recipient if a single recipient exists.
properties.rdfs:label: dateRead

properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of recipient. The recipient blind copied on a message.
properties.rdfs:label: bccRecipient

properties.rdfs:comment: The date/time at which the message was sent.
properties.rdfs:label: dateSent

properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of recipient. The recipient copied on a message.
properties.rdfs:label: ccRecipient

properties.rdfs:comment: A CreativeWork attached to the message.
properties.rdfs:label: messageAttachment

properties.rdfs:comment: The date/time the message was received if a single recipient exists.
properties.rdfs:label: dateReceived

properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of recipient. The recipient who was directly sent the message.
properties.rdfs:label: toRecipient
